amendment.description: Amendment to redirect funds from EPA bureaucracy to the Forest Service Hazardous Fuels account in order to prevent dangerous wildfires.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in House Report 114-683 to redirect funds from EPA bureaucracy to the Forest Service Hazardous Fuels account in order to prevent dangerous wildfires.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Gosar.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
